import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { StudentdataService } from 'src/app/shared/studentdata.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-viewstudents', templateUrl: './viewstudents.component.html', styleUrls: ['./viewstudents.component.css'] }) export class ViewstudentsComponent implements OnInit{ studdetail:any; constructor(public serv:StudentdataService, public router:Router){} ngOnInit(): void { this.serv.getstudentdata().subscribe((data=>{ this.studdetail=data; console.log(this.studdetail) })) } }
